meanings.sent1: The unsensitized child was unaware of the danger.
meanings.sent2: She felt unsensitized to the emotions of others.
meanings.sent3: The unsensitized puppy kept chasing its tail, oblivious to everything else.
meanings.sent4: His unsensitized mind was like a closed door, impervious to new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The unsensitized forest remained untouched by the changing seasons.

meanings.sent1: The unsensitized equipment failed to detect the subtle changes.
meanings.sent2: The unsensitized camera could not capture the faint details.
meanings.sent3: The unsensitized robot kept bumping into walls, unable to learn from its mistakes.
meanings.sent4: Her unsensitized taste buds missed out on the delicate flavors of the dish.
meanings.sent5: The unsensitized skin was unresponsive to the gentle touch.

meanings.sent1: His unsensitized comments hurt her feelings without him realizing.
meanings.sent2: The unsensitized person failed to notice the subtle changes in the room.
meanings.sent3: The unsensitized driver missed the turn, lost in thought.
meanings.sent4: Her unsensitized ears couldn't pick up the soft whispers in the room.
meanings.sent5: The unsensitized mind was closed off to the beauty of the world.
